description:
A descendant of humanity from the far future, which has been destroyed by a pandemic. One of the few humans who was resistant to the Revisions. She is an agent called a "Balancer" who works for the organization AHRV, which protects the future where humanity still survives. She has strong feelings of hatred towards the Revisions for their massacres of AHRV`s members, and devotes herself to the organization entirely. Emotionally inexpressive, she lives a logical, orderly life.
Source: Official page
name: Milo
